rules.fullName: APAC-Escalate Resolved Case based on refund fields
rules.description: Escalate the Inbound Case if the case is resolved and refund fields are filled.
rules.formula: AND( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Inbound') , NOT( INCLUDES(Platform__c,'Damejidlo')), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Partial_Refund_Amount__c))), Partial_Refund_Amount__c>0, ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Resolved') )

rules.description: SP-850 - Notification to office@mjam.net whenever an MP ticket is created Deactivated as per SP 4098

rules.description: Created during DE live date, because PDE and LH web form are still pointing to Contact_Email field instead of Customer_Email

rules.formula: AND( OR( TEXT(Opportunity__r.Business_Type__c ) = "New Business", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Business_Type__c ) = "Win Back", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Business_Type__c ) = "Owner Change" ), Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = "DE_Account", TEXT(Account.Account_Status__c) = "Active", TEXT(Account.Type) = "Branch - Main", ISBLANK( Account.ParentId ), TEXT(Case_Reason__c) = "Onboarding", TEXT(Type) = "Onboarding", Send_Survey__c = True, ISBLANK(Survey_Date__c) )

rules.description: Auto Close Case after it has been in status - "Waiting for Answer" for more than 96 hours
